price: Huwag kang gumawa kasama kay Allāh ng isang diyos na iba pa para mauuwi kang isang pinupulaang itinatatwa.
arabic: لَّا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَذۡمُومٗا مَّخۡذُولٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fataqʿuda madhmūman makhdhūlan
